summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MINEX GLOBAL platform features. All requested features are working correctly: Landing page FAQ (6 questions), Testimonials (4 reviews), Active Packages Slider, Footer © 2026, User Dashboard 'Cash Wallet' label with animations, Admin Packages 'Direct Comm. / Profit Share' labels, Admin Deposits scrollable modal with close button, Email verification endpoint, and Commission distribution only to Level 1.

critical_code_review_comments: Commission distribution logic correctly implements two-tiered system: Direct commission on deposits (Level 1 only), Profit share from ROI (Levels 2-6 via roi_scheduler.py)
SendGrid email integration configured but may have permission issues - falls back gracefully to DB logging
seed_data_creation: None - used existing admin and master user accounts
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from the original problem statement have been implemented and tested. The platform has: 1) Unified Investment Package system with 6 levels, 2) Two-tiered commission system (Direct commission on deposits for Level 1, Profit share from ROI for Levels 2-6), 3) Email verification with SendGrid (falls back to DB logging), 4) Landing page with FAQ (6 questions), Testimonials (4 reviews), Active Packages slider, 5) Admin deposit modal that is scrollable with close button, 6) User dashboard with 'Cash Wallet' label and hover animations, 7) Footer year updated to 2026. SendGrid API key is configured but may have permission issues - emails are logged to database as fallback.
